sentences.english: Maybe I'm going to Mount Emei next vacation. but I'm not sure.
sentences.chinese: 或許我可以在下個假期去峨眉山，但我不會去。
然後我們去爬了峨眉山。

sentences.english: Tourists coming to Leshan & Emeishan Scenic Areas will have no worries about transportation.
sentences.chinese: 到樂山和峨眉山風景區的遊客無須擔心交通的問題。

sentences.english: There's a bright star right next to tonight's waxing gibbous moon.
sentences.chinese: 有一顆明亮的星昨天在今晚峨眉凸月的右邊。

sentences.english: He told me that he would go to Mount Emei for holidays.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我說他要去峨眉山度假。

sentences.english: Emei Mountain Halfmoon wheels fall into shadow water level Qiang Jiang.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山月半輪秋影入江水位強。

sentences.english: Southwest Jiaotong University, Emei Campus 36th Party Schools talented students.
sentences.chinese: 西南交大大年夜峨眉校區第三十六期黨校優良學員。

sentences.english: She says she has never been to Mount Emei.
sentences.chinese: 她說她從來沒有去過峨眉山。

sentences.english: You can tell me more about Mount Emei later.
sentences.chinese: 以後你可以告訴我更多有關峨眉山的事情。

sentences.english: When we climbed to the peak of mountain.
sentences.chinese: 當我們最終登臨峨眉山頂。

sentences.english: Tourists coming to Leshan &Emeishan Scenic Areas will have no worries about transportation.
sentences.chinese: 到樂山和峨眉山風景區的遊客無須擔心交通的問題。

sentences.english: The E eyebrow old nun smugly says.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉老尼洋洋自得的說道。

sentences.english: We came back from Mount Emei in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我們晚上才從峨眉山回來。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution of genus Asarum in Mt. Emei of China in relation to systematics.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山細辛屬的分佈及其與系統分類的關係。

sentences.english: Holding three were founded lily, northern.
sentences.chinese: 抱着三枚金針，創立峨眉。

sentences.english: The basement of Baihetan Hydropower Plant is the Emei Mountain Basalt.
sentences.chinese: 擬建的白鶴灘水電站的壩基爲峨眉山玄武岩。
